parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Optionally can set step. If you want to count down, step must be specified, and set negative. Default value is 1.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> for '''step''' stepSize

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> for: [[For Type]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> stepSize: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[For Type]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>for "_x" from 20 to 10 step -2 do {..code..}</inner><close></pre></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Control Structures]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
